mapper.select: SELECT t1.FSTOCKID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FGROUP, t4.FNAME AS groupName, t1.FMODIFYDATE FROM T_BD_STOCK t1, T_BD_STOCK_L t2, T_BD_STOCKGROUP t3, T_BD_STOCKGROUP_L t4 WHERE t1.FSTOCKID = t2.FSTOCKID AND t1.FGROUP = t3.FID AND t3.FID = t4.FID

SELECT t1.FSTOCKID, t1.FNUMBER, t2.FNAME, t1.FGROUP, t4.FNAME AS groupName, t1.FMODIFYDATE FROM T_BD_STOCK t1, T_BD_STOCK_L t2, T_BD_STOCKGROUP t3, T_BD_STOCKGROUP_L t4 WHERE t1.FSTOCKID = t2.FSTOCKID AND t1.FGROUP = t3.FID AND t3.FID = t4.FID AND t1.FMODIFYDATE > #{maxOutDate}
SELECT t1.FNUMBER as number, t2.FNAME as name FROM T_BD_STOCK t1, T_BD_STOCK_L t2 WHERE t1.FSTOCKID = t2.FSTOCKID
SELECT t2.FNAME FROM T_BD_STOCK t1, T_BD_STOCK_L t2 WHERE t1.FSTOCKID = t2.FSTOCKID and t2.FNAME like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
